K01vinv_06u:5: glānakāś ca kaineyo vargo bhavati samudyataḥ //

K01vinv_06u:16: etarhi bhadanta bhikṣavaḥ śāradakena rogeṇa bādhyante /

K01vinv_06u:21: bhikṣavaḥ kāle sevanti kālātikrāntaṃ na sevanti /

K01vinv_06u:25: uktaṃ mayā bhikṣubhir bhaiṣajyaṃ sevitavyam iti /
K01vinv_06u:26: atha ca punar bhikṣavaḥ utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukāḥ kṛṣālukā durbalakā mlānā aprāptakāyāḥ /

K01vinv_06u:329: yasmād āyuṣmān (fol. 94r3 = GBM 6.769) revato yatra kvacana kāṃkṣī tasya kāṃkṣārevataḥ kāṃkṣārevata iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv_06u:330: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ /

K01vinv_06u:335: ārya asti kiṃcid anyaṃ bandhaṃ jānāsi /
K01vinv_06u:349: āyuṣmantaḥ saṃghasya guḍakhādanīyaṃ saṃpannaṃ kiṃ na paribhuñjata /
K01vinv_06u:354: tair na paribhuktam iti yadbhūyasā sarvasaṃghena na paribhuktam* /
K01vinv_06u:355: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata (MSV I xii) ārocayanti bhagavān āha /
K01vinv_06u:357: āgārapariśuddham iti kṛtvā paribhoktavyaṃ nātra kaukṛtyaṃ karaṇīyam* /
K01vinv_06u:359: athāyuṣmān revataḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastyāṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:361: tena gāṃdhiko dṛṣṭaḥ saktuṃ spṛṣṭvā guḍaṃ spṛśati /
K01vinv_06u:363: bhadramukha mā saktuṃ spṛṣṭvā guḍaṃ spṛśa /
K01vinv_06u:366: ārya ko mama muhur muhur hastaśaucaṃ dadāti /

K01vinv_06u:381: tair na paribhuktam iti yadbhūyasā sarvasaṃghena na
K01vinv_06u:392: bahuśo mayā āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya paricaryā kṛtā na tu kadācid vaidyaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:395: bhadramukha āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyedaṃ cedaṃ ca glānyam utpannaṃ tasyānulomikabhaiṣajyam upadiśeti
K01vinv_06u:402: asti āyuṣman mama śṛṅgāpuṭaṃ lavaṇaṃ yāvajjīvam adhiṣṭhitam* /
K01vinv_06u:403: yadi bhagavān anujānīte dadāmīti śāriputreṇa śrutam* /
K01vinv_06u:405: mama mānasa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana evaṃ bhavati /
K01vinv_06u:408: etat prakaraṇam āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavata ārocayati /
K01vinv_06u:410: na labhyaṃ maudgalyāyana yac ca kālikaṃ yac ca yāmikaṃ yac ca sāptāhikaṃ yac ca yāvajjīvikam adhiṣṭhitam* /
K01vinv_06u:411: tatra maudgalyāyana yac ca yāmikaṃ yac ca sāptāhikaṃ yac ca yāvajjīvikaṃ tac cet kālikena saṃsṛṣṭaṃ bhavati kālikasaṃsṛṣṭam iti kṛtvā kāle paribhoktavyaṃ kālātikrāntaṃ na paribhoktavyam* yac ca yāmikaṃ yac ca sāptāhikaṃ yac ca yāvajjīvikaṃ tac ca yāmikena saṃsṛṣṭam iti kṛtvā yāmaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ yāmātikrāntaṃ (MSV I xiv) na paribhoktavyam* /
K01vinv_06u:412: yac ca sāptāhikaṃ yac ca yāvajjīvikaṃ tac cet sāptāhikena saṃsṛṣṭaṃ bhavati sāptāhikasaṃsṛṣṭam iti kṛtvā sāptāhaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ saptāhātikrāntaṃ na paribhoktavyam* {MS adds saptāhasyātyayān na paribhoktavyam*} /
K01vinv_06u:413: yan nu yāvajjīvikaṃ tad yāvajjīvikaṃ paribhoktavyam* /
K01vinv_06u:417: buddho bhagavān kāśīṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ /

K01vinv_06u:427: yanv aham etarhi bhagavantaṃ traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayeyam iti viditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:428: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /

K01vinv_06u:437: atha paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā samagre kāśmīramaṇḍale śāsanaṃ praveśayiṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:440: ṣaṣṭir grāmās trayo grāmā hy etat kāśmīramaṇḍalam* /

K01vinv_06u:449: bhagavāṃs tasya vinayakālaṃ jñātvā kumbhakāraveṣaṃ gṛhītvā tena sārdhaṃ jalpaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ
K01vinv_06u:460: tato bhagavatā kumbhakāraveṣam (MSV I B) antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā
K01vinv_06u:463: śādvalāyāṃ mahāyakṣaparivāraḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ pālitakoṭo nāgapālakaś ca /
K01vinv_06u:465: nandivardhane bhavadevo rājā saparivāraḥ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ sasaptamātaṅgaputro bhūpayakṣaś ca /
K01vinv_06u:469: nāvayor bhagavatā dharmo deśito yenāvāṃ vinipatitau nāgayonau jātau /
K01vinv_06u:473: sthānam etad vidyate yat parinirvṛtasya me śāsanaṃ bhasma kariṣyata iti viditvā yenāśvakapunarvasukayor bhavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:476: ke vayaṃ saddharmasya jñātāra iti viditvā tatraiva nimagnau /
K01vinv_06u:480: bhagavatā tasminn eva pradeśo pratimaikā dattā /
K01vinv_06u:482: adyāpi bhagavāṃs tiṣṭhatīti tasminn eva pradeśe /
K01vinv_06u:483: bhagavatā nālī udaryā ca yakṣiṇī vinītā /
K01vinv_06u:485: kuntīnagare kuntī yakṣiṇī iti khyātā krodhānvitā caṇḍā ca prativasati /
K01vinv_06u:486: kuntīnagarasya brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ jātāni jātāny apatyāni bhakṣayati /
K01vinv_06u:487: aśrauṣuḥ kauntīnāgarā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavān kuntīnagaram anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:488: tasmin pradeśe tiṣṭhatīti śrutvā te sannipatitāḥ kuntīnagarān nirgatāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:490: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:491: ekāntaniṣaṇṇānāṃ kauntīnāgarāṇāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ bhagavān* dharmyayā kathayā pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv_06u:492: atha śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapataya utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocan* /
K01vinv_06u:493: adhivāsayatv asmākaṃ bhagavān* śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K01vinv_06u:494: atha bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā yācamāna evaṃ cāha
K01vinv_06u:495: / bhagavatā te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣā vinītāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:496: iyaṃ bhadanta kuntī yakṣiṇī asmākaṃ dīrgharātram asapatnānāṃ sapatnī adrugdhānāṃ drogdhrī jātāni jātāny apatyāni harati /
K01vinv_06u:497: aho vata bhagavān kuntīṃ yakṣiṇīṃ vinayed anukampām upādāyeti /
K01vinv_06u:498: tena khalu samayena kuntī yakṣiṇī tasyām eva parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇābhūt* sannipatitā /
K01vinv_06u:506: = GBM 6.952) viraṃsyāmi yady ete mamārthāya vihāraṃ kārayanti /
K01vinv_06u:512: atha bhagavān kuntīṃ yakṣīṇīṃ saparivārāṃ vinīya prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:515: bhagavān bāladārakān pāṃsustūpakaiḥ krīḍato dṛṣṭvā ca (MSV I 2) punar vajrapāṇiṃ yakṣam āmantrayate
K01vinv_06u:516: paśyasi tvaṃ vajrapāṇe bāladārakān pāṃsustūpakaiḥ krīḍataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:518: eṣa caturvarṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama vajrapāṇe kuśanavaṃśyaḥ kaniṣko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati
K01vinv_06u:522: tato bhagavān yāvac cāpalālasya bhavanaṃ yāvac ca rohitakam atrāntare saptasaptatiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vinīya rohitakam āgatya vihāraṃ praviśya pratisaṃlīnaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:523: bhagavān sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāyāyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
K01vinv_06u:536: gato 'ham ānanda yāvac ca rohitakaṃ yāvac cāpalālasya nāgarājasya
K01vinv_06u:539: pañcādīnavā uttarāpathe sthāṇukaṇṭakadrumapāṣāṇaśarkaraś caṇḍakukkuro duṣṭhulasamudācāro mātṛgrāmaḥ
K01vinv_06u:541: ādirājyaṃ ca bhadrāśvo mathurā otalā ca /
K01vinv_06u:542: ārāmavairaṃbhya ayodhyā ca nadī gaṅgā pretā velāmo bhavati paścimaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:543: atha bhagavāñ chūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carann ādirājyam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:545: asminn ānanda pradeśe mahāsammato rājā prathamato rājyābhiṣekenābhiṣiktaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:546: abhiṣikto 'yaṃ ca rājñām ādirato 'syādirājyaḥ ādirājya iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv_06u:549: asminn ānanda pradeśe rājño mahāsammatasya bhadram aśvaratnaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ yato 'sya bhadrāśvo bhadrāśva iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv_06u:552: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ
K01vinv_06u:555: dūrād eva nīlanīlāṃ bhagavān vanarājiṃ dṛṣṭvā punar āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
K01vinv_06u:556: paśyasi tvam ānanda etāṃ nīlanīlāṃ vanarājim* /
K01vinv_06u:559: atra mathurāyāṃ naṭo bhaṭaś ca dvau bhrātarau mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayataḥ
K01vinv_06u:560: tatas tasya naṭabhaṭika iti saṃjñā bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:563: adyānanda mathurāyāṃ gupto nāma gāndhikadārako bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:564: tasya putraḥ upagupto nāma bhaviṣyati alakṣaṇako buddhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:565: sa mama varṣoṣitasya parinirvṛtasya śāsane pravrajya buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:574: ye ye tasyāvavāde arhatvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyanti te te caturaṅgulamātrāṃ kaṭikāṃ tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ prakṣepsyante /
K01vinv_06u:575: yadā sā guhā purṇā bhaviṣyati arhatkaṭikābhis tadā upaguptaḥ parinirvāsyati /
K01vinv_06u:576: parinirvṛtaṃ cainaṃ tābhir evārhatkaṭikābhiḥ sametya te dhmāpayiṣyanti /
K01vinv_06u:577: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripapracchuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:581: na bhikṣava etarhi yathāsāv atīte 'py adhvani bahujanahitāya pratipannas tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣye /
K01vinv_06u:582: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asyaiva urumuṇḍasya parvatasya triṣu pārśveṣu pratyekabuddhā ṛṣayo markaṭāś ca prativasanti /
K01vinv_06u:584: I 5) pratyekabuddhaśatāni dvitīye pañca ṛṣiśatāni tṛtīye pañca
K01vinv_06u:586: ācaritaṃ markaṭayūthapater jātaṃ jātaṃ markaṭaśāvakaṃ praghātayati /
K01vinv_06u:587: tatas tā markaṭyaḥ śāvakaśokābhibhūtāḥ parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:589: ayam asmākaṃ yūthapatir jātaṃ jātaṃ śāvakaṃ praghātayati /
K01vinv_06u:591: yā asmākaṃ markaṭī āpannasatvā bhavati tayā yūthapater nārocayitavyam iti /
K01vinv_06u:592: yāvad apareṇa samayenānyatamā markaṭī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv_06u:593: sā tābhiḥ pratigupte pradeśe gopāyitvā mūlaphalair upasthāpitā /
K01vinv_06u:595: so 'pi tābhiḥ pratigupte pradeśe sthāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:596: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā tenāsau yūthapatiḥ svayūthāt pracyāvitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:597: urumuṇḍaparvate itaś cāmutaś ca (fol. 143r1 = GBM 6.954) paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:600: yadā viśvastasaṃvāsaḥ saṃvṛttas {MS smṛtaḥ} tadā teṣāṃ mūlapatrapuṣpaphaladantakāṣṭhair upasaṃhāraṃ karoti /
K01vinv_06u:602: ācaritaṃ teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā paryaṅke niṣīdanti /
K01vinv_06u:603: so 'pi markaṭas teṣām īryāpathaṃ dṛṣṭvā paryaṅkena niṣīdati /
K01vinv_06u:604: yāvad apareṇa samayena teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānām etad abhavat* /
K01vinv_06u:606: prāptaṃ tad yan nu vayaṃ śāntaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśema iti /
K01vinv_06u:607: tatas te jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāḥ
K01vinv_06u:611: sa markaṭas tān apaśyan dhṛtiṃ na labhate /
K01vinv_06u:612: yāvad asau markaṭo guhāṃ praviśya teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ cīvarāṇi vikopayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:613: yā devatā tasyāṃ guhāyām adhyuṣitā tasyā etad abhavat* /
K01vinv_06u:614: mā haivāyaṃ śākhāmṛgaḥ pratyekabuddhacīvarāṇi vikopayiṣyatīti dvāraṃ mahatyā śilayā pidhāyāvasthitā
K01vinv_06u:615: tato 'sau markaṭaḥ śocitvā klamitvā paridevitvā prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:617: anabhiratitvād dhṛtiṃ na labhamāno 'vahitaśrotro manuṣyaśabdam ākāṃkṣati /
K01vinv_06u:619: sa mārgapranaṣṭa ivādhvagas tvaritatvaritaṃ teṣāṃ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:624: / yadāsau markaṭas taiḥ sārdhaṃ viśvastasaṃvāsaḥ saṃvṛttas tadā teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ mūlapatrapuṣpaphaladantakāṣṭhair upasaṃhāraṃ karoti /
K01vinv_06u:626: sa teṣām īryāpathaṃ vyākopya pratyekabuddheryāpathaṃ deśayati /
K01vinv_06u:627: tatra ye ūrdhvahastakās teṣāṃ hastān adhaḥ kṛtvā ricchaṭāśabdaṃ ca kṛtvā purastāt paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvatiṣṭhate /
K01vinv_06u:628: ye pañcatapas tapyante teṣām agniṃ nirvāpya ricchaṭāśabdaṃ kṛtvā purastāt paryaṅkenāvatiṣṭhate
K01vinv_06u:633: bhavantaḥ smṛtimanto hy ete śākhāmṛgā bhavanti /
K01vinv_06u:634: nūnam anena īryāpathena ke (MSV I 7) ṛṣayo 'nena dṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti /
K01vinv_06u:635: yūyam api yathāsthāpitaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdatha /
K01vinv_06u:638: tair anācāryakair anupādhyāyakair jñānena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣadharmān utpādya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtas teṣāṃ markaṭasyāntike dharmānvayaḥ prasāda utpannaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:639: te yāni navaśasyāni (fol. 143v1 = GBM 6.955) navaphalāni navartukāni janapadāt piṇḍapātaṃ pratilabhate tāni tasmai prathamato datvā
K01vinv_06u:641: tāvad apareṇa samayena sa markaṭaḥ kālagataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:642: tatas taiḥ pratyekabuddhair nānādigdeśādhiṣṭhāneṣu gandhakāṣṭhāni samādāpya sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā dhmāpitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:644: yo 'sau pratyekabuddhaiḥ saṃpoṣito markaṭaḥ sa evāsāv upaguptaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:645: tadāpy asau bahujanahitāya pratipannaḥ etarhy apy asau mayā bahujanahitānukampī vyākṛta iti
K01vinv_06u:646: atha bhagavāñ chūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran mathurām anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:647: aśrauṣur māthurā brāhmaṇāḥ śramaṇo gautamo mathurām anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:649: 'tyarthaṃ cāturvarṇaviśuddhiṃ rocayati dīpayati prajñapayati prasthāpayati virujati vivṛṇoti uttānīkaroti deśayati /
K01vinv_06u:650: yady asau mathurāṃ pravekṣyati asmākaṃ lābhāntarāyo bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:652: yadi tasya kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryād evam asau mathurāṃ na praviśet* iti cāsya nīcapuruṣo 'satkāraṃ kuryāt* (MSV I 8) pravekṣyati na citrīkariṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:653: yady asya pradhānapuruṣaḥ kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryāc chobhanaṃ syāt* /
K01vinv_06u:655: tena khalu samayena mathurāyāṃ nīlabhūtir nāma brāhmaṇo vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ svavādoddyotakaḥ paravādanigrahasamarthaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:657: tato māthurā brāhmaṇāḥ saṅgamya samāgamya nīlabhūteḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:658: upādhyāya śrūyate śramaṇo gautamo ihāgata iti /
K01vinv_06u:662: yadi tasya kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryād evam asau mathurāṃ na pravekṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:665: yady asya pradhānapuruṣaḥ kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryāc chobhanaṃ syāt* /
K01vinv_06u:672: tato nīlabhūtir brāhmaṇo vṛddhavṛddhair mathurānivāsibhir brāhmaṇaiḥ saṃpuraskṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:673: adrākṣīn nīlabhūtir brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyomaprabhālaṅkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ (MSV I jaṃgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam anyataraṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya śāntena īryāpathena niṣaṇṇam* /
K01vinv_06u:675: praṇidhāya manaḥ sahendriyair vidhivad* (fol. 144r1 = GBM 6.956) vāk* ca śarīram eva ca /
K01vinv_06u:679: caraṇaṃ susamāptam eva te susamāptavrata sādhitavrataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:680: balavāṃś ca samādhir avyayas tava nārāyaṇaśailarājavat* // 3
K01vinv_06u:681: puruṣarṣabha nāsti te vyathā na viṣādo na bhayaṃ na ca klamaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:682: na ca te vyasanaṃ kutaḥ kalir na ca bhūteṣu kadācid akṣamā // 4
K01vinv_06u:683: na ca dhāvasi nātilīyase na ca santapyasi nāpi hṛṣyase /
K01vinv_06u:684: satataṃ śubham eva te manaḥ satataṃ merur ivācalādhipaḥ // 5
K01vinv_06u:685: munipuṅgava sarvadhātubhir vipulaṃ jñānam apāvṛtaṃ tava /
K01vinv_06u:687: na ca te 'sti mune kathaṃkathā vimatir nāsti na saṃśayaḥ kvacit* /
K01vinv_06u:688: svayam eva na te parāparaṃ viditaṃ sarvam avedi vidyayā // 7
K01vinv_06u:690: samam eva hi te priyāpriyaṃ satataṃ prītikaras tatheryase // 8
K01vinv_06u:692: vividānumataṃ prabhāṣase triṣu lokeṣu ca te stṛtaṃ yaśaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:694: upagamya mune punaḥ punaḥ paripṛcchanti na cābhiṣūyase // 10
K01vinv_06u:696: pratiyānti vinītasaṃśayāś caraṇau vandya ca te mahāmune // 11
K01vinv_06u:697: sthitam āsitam āgataṃ gataṃ śayitaṃ maunam athābhyudīritam* /
K01vinv_06u:698: atha cīvarapātradhāraṇaṃ ruciraṃ gautama sarvam eva te // 12
K01vinv_06u:700: vacanaṃ punar uktavarjitaṃ samaye vyāharase narottama // 13
K01vinv_06u:701: balavān asi lokaviśrutaḥ puruṣajñaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ prabhuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:702: na ca manyasi nāvamanyase sakalaṃ lokam imaṃ sadaivatam* // 14
K01vinv_06u:703: na ca vismayase kadācana prakṛtistheṣu calācaleṣu ca /
K01vinv_06u:704: suhṛdeṣu ca durhṛdeṣu ca pratikūleṣv anulomavatsu ca // 15
K01vinv_06u:707: prasamīkṣya jagat samākulaṃ vividhair duḥkhaśatair upadrutam* /
K01vinv_06u:709: avatārya muner mahākṛpāṃ vividhāṃ cātmagatāṃ prabhāvatām* /
K01vinv_06u:710: svayam eva hi śākyapuṅgava vyathitān mocayituṃ tvam udyataḥ // 18
K01vinv_06u:711: bhavaduḥkham idaṃ sahetukaṃ bhavaduḥkhasya ca yaḥ parikṣayaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:714: na ca te sadṛśaḥ kuto 'dhikas triṣu lokeṣv api naiva vidyate // 20
K01vinv_06u:715: pratighānunayā (fol. 144v1 = GBM 6.957) na santi te na ca te santi mune parisravāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:716: anurodhavirodhavigrahāḥ satataṃ suvrata naiva naiva te // 21
K01vinv_06u:717: apahāya mune priyāpriye sukhaduḥkhe viṣamaṃ samaṃ tathā /
K01vinv_06u:718: aratiṃ ca ratiṃ viparyayann upaśāntaś carasīha saṃyataḥ // 22
K01vinv_06u:719: vyasane na ca nāma nirmanā na ca nāmonnamase praśaṃsayā /
K01vinv_06u:720: ayaśaś ca yaśaś ca te samaṃ samam ākruṣṭam athāpi vanditam* // 23
K01vinv_06u:721: ativākyam atho titikṣase puruṣaṃ pāpajanair udīritam* /
K01vinv_06u:722: samarāgragato viṣāṇavān bhṛśamuktān iva kuñjaraḥ śarān* // 24
K01vinv_06u:723: suvacas tvam ṛṣe vacaḥkṣamaḥ sudurukteṣv api nābhiṣūyase /
K01vinv_06u:724: samam eva ca vartase mune paribhāṣāsu śubhāsu vākṣu ca // 25
K01vinv_06u:726: ṛṣibhiś ca sadā mahātmabhir na ca te vikriyate sthiraṃ manaḥ // 26
K01vinv_06u:727: pravaro 'ham ito na manyase 'tyavaro 'ham ito na manyase /
K01vinv_06u:728: sadṛśo 'ham ito na manyase trividhā mānavidhā na santi te // 27
K01vinv_06u:730: tṛṇakāṣṭhasamaṃ mahāmune carasīdaṃ hi sadevakaṃ jagat* // 28
K01vinv_06u:732: adhivāsayase nagendravan na ca te pravyathate sthiraṃ manaḥ // 29
K01vinv_06u:734: idam arthikato nideśase pratisaṃkhyāya mune nirāsravam* // 30
K01vinv_06u:735: na ca śocasi nātha nāsti me na ca te santi mune parigrahāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:737: na ca lābham avāpya hṛṣyase tadalābhāc ca layaṃ na gacchasi /
K01vinv_06u:738: avamānam atho titikṣase na ca saṃmānam ihābhinandasi // 32
K01vinv_06u:740: asayo niśitāḥ śarāś ca te na vikurvanti manaḥ kadācana // 33
K01vinv_06u:741: na kathāṃ kathayasy anarthikāṃ na ca yā durjanasevitā kathā /
K01vinv_06u:742: na ca lābhakathā na sāmiṣā na ca yā nānumatā mahātmabhiḥ // 34
K01vinv_06u:743: pravivekakathāḥ sukhāvahāḥ praśamaṃ yāḥ pravadanti kevalam* /
K01vinv_06u:744: kathayasy atidevatāḥ kathāḥ kathitā yā vinayanti kilviṣam* // 35
K01vinv_06u:745: madhurāṇi ca saṅgatāni ca svabhinītāni ca sāravanti ca /
K01vinv_06u:746: vacanāni mune prabhāṣase jagadarthāya viniścitāni ca // 36
K01vinv_06u:748: piśunāḥ paruṣāḥ śaṭhāś ca ye bhagavaṃs taiḥ saha saṅgataṃ na te // 37
K01vinv_06u:749: aśaṭhā ṛjavaś ca ye narāḥ śucayaḥ satyaratā jitendriyāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:750: satataṃ ca samīkṣyakāriṇo bhagavaṃs taiḥ saha saṅgataṃ tava // 38
K01vinv_06u:751: dharmajña nayajña pudgalajña tvāṃ vande ṣaḍabhijña sarvadaiva /
K01vinv_06u:752: kṣetrajña mune parāparajña tvāṃ vande śirasā nayānayajña // 39
K01vinv_06u:753: pṛthum api samīkṣate guṇaṃ tava parikathito hi mayā guṇaikadeśaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:755: na tava guṇamahārṇavasya pāraṃ jagati pumān adhigantum ārya śaktaḥ // 40
K01vinv_06u:756: ity evamādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ stotraśatair bhagavān abhiṣṭutaḥ {MS abhituṣṭaḥ}
K01vinv_06u:757: / tathābhiprasannasya ca bhagavatā nīlabhūter dharmo deśitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:758: yathā yathā tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:759: atha nīlabhūtir brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ stutvā prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:764: bhavanto na tv ahaṃ pūrvam avocam* /
K01vinv_06u:771: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya mathurāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K01vinv_06u:772: tena khalu samayena mathurāyāṃ nakṣatrarātraḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
K01vinv_06u:773: / atha yā devatā mathurāyām adhyuṣitā tasyā etad abhavat* /
K01vinv_06u:775: mama nakṣatrarātrer antarāyaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā bhagavataḥ purastād vinagno 'sthāt* /
K01vinv_06u:777: apraticchannas tāvad devate mātṛgrāmo na śobhate prāg eva vinagna iti /
K01vinv_06u:778: atha sā devatā jihrīya nagnarūpā ekānte 'pakrāntā /
K01vinv_06u:779: tato bhagavān mārgād apakramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:785: atha bahagavān na praviśann eva mathurāṃ yena gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K01vinv_06u:786: upasaṃkramya gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanam abhyavagāhyānyatarad vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya /
K01vinv_06u:787: aśrauṣur māthurā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavān piṇḍāya prāviśat* devatayā viheṭhitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:788: apraviśann eva mathurāṃ gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanaṃ gata iti śrutvā ca punaḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ sthālīpākaṃ samudānīya śakaṭe āropya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:789: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:790: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān* śrāddhān māthurān brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv_06u:791: atha śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapataya utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:792: ihāsmābhir bhadanta bhagavantam uddiśya śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya śakaṭaṃ pūrṇam ānītam* /
K01vinv_06u:793: tad bhagavān pratigṛhṇātu anukampām upādāya iti /
K01vinv_06u:795: gacchānanda yāvanto bhikṣavo gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanam (fol. 145v1 = GBM 6.959) upaniśritya 16) viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātaya /
K01vinv_06u:797: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvanto bhikṣavo gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt* /
K01vinv_06u:798: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:799: yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavo gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanam upaniśritya viharanti sarve te upasthānaśālāyāṃ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipatitāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:802: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:803: atha māthurāḥ śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā pūrvavad yāvad dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ purastāt tasthur āyācamānaṃ cāhuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:804: bhagavatā bhadanta te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣāś ca vinītāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:810: aho vata bhagavān gardabhakaṃ yakṣaṃ vinayed anukampām upādāyeti /
K01vinv_06u:811: tena khalu samayena gardabhako yakṣas tasyām eva parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt sannipatitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:819: yadi mām uddiśya cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vihāraṃ kārayantīti /
K01vinv_06u:820: tatra bhagavān māthurān śrāddhān brahmaṇagṛhapatīn āmantrayate /
K01vinv_06u:824: tatra bhagavatā gardabhako yakṣaḥ pañcaśataparivāro vinītaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:825: śrāddhair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhis tān uddiśya pañca vihāraśatāni kāritāni /
K01vinv_06u:826: evaṃ śaro yakṣo vano yakṣaḥ ālikāvendā maghā yakṣiṇī vinītā /
K01vinv_06u:827: atha bhagavatā ṛddhyā mathurāṃ praviśya timisikā {MS
K01vinv_06u:828: bhagavato bhagavān ṛddhyā vinītā} yakṣiṇī pañcaśataparivārā vinītā /
K01vinv_06u:830: tatra bhagavatā sāntarbahir mathurāyām ardhatṛtīyāni yakṣasahasrāṇi vinītāni /
K01vinv_06u:831: tāny uddiśya śrāddhair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhir ardhatṛtīyāni vihārasahasrāṇi kāritāni /
K01vinv_06u:835: tatra otalāyano nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga iti vistaraḥ
K01vinv_06u:836: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya otalāyāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K01vinv_06u:839: adrākṣus te kārṣikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaṃ (fol. 146r1 =
K01vinv_06u:843: atha tad balīvardasahasraṃ yoktrāṇi varatrāṇi cchitvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntam*
K01vinv_06u:844: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā saṃparivāryāvatasthuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:845: bhagavatā teṣāṃ tribhiḥ padair dharmo deśito yāvac cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:847: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:848: kiṃ bhadanta ebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ kārṣikaśatair ebhiś ca balīvardaiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena kārṣikāḥ saṃvṛttā daridragṛheṣūpapannāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:851: ebhir evaṃ bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānīti vistaraḥ /
K01vinv_06u:855: ebhiś ca balīvardais tatraiva pravrajitaiḥ kṣudrānukṣudraiḥ śikṣāpadair anādaraṃ kṛtam*
K01vinv_06u:857: yat te kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajitās tasya karmaṇo vipākena mamāntikāt satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti vistaraḥ /
K01vinv_06u:858: aśrauṣīd otalāyano brāhmaṇaḥ śramaṇo gautamo otalām anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:864: tena ca pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ śramaṇo gautamaḥ saśrāvakaṃ saṃghaṃ bhojayitvā praṇidhānaṃ karoti /
K01vinv_06u:865: sa yac cintayati yat prārthayate tat sarvaṃ pratilabhate iti /
K01vinv_06u:866: atha otalāyano brāhmaṇaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:867: adhivāsayatu me bhagavan gautama śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
K01vinv_06u:868: pūrvavad yāvad bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ cintayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:869: yāvanta ime śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyā mayā bhojitāḥ sarva ete mama balīvardāḥ syur iti /
K01vinv_06u:870: atha bhagavān otalāyanasya brāhmaṇasya cetasā cittam ājñāya otalāyanaṃ brāhmaṇam idam avocat*
K01vinv_06u:873: tathā hy ete sarve bhikṣavaḥ kṣīṇapunarbhavāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:874: anyac cittam utpādayety uktvā bhagavān dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:875: atha bhagavān vihāraṃ gataḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:877: otalāyanena bhikṣavo brāhmaṇena mithyāpraṇidhānasamutthaṃ (MSV I 20) pāpakaṃ cittam utpāditam*
K01vinv_06u:881: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayād otalāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣad āyuṣmatā ānandena paścācchramaṇena
K01vinv_06u:884: bhagavāṃs tasya vinayakālam avekṣyāyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
K01vinv_06u:887: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena kacaṃgalā vṛddhā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K01vinv_06u:892: tataḥ kacaṃgalā udakaghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā tvaritatvaritā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā /
K01vinv_06u:893: dadarśa kacaṃgalā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyomaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
K01vinv_06u:895: sā ūrdhvabāhuḥ putra putreti bhagavantaṃ pariṣvaṅktum ārabdhā /
K01vinv_06u:898: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ etāṃ vṛddhāṃ vārayata /
K01vinv_06u:900: pañca janmaśatāny eṣā me mātābhūn nirantaram* /
K01vinv_06u:901: sā ced eṣā nivāritā mama gātrasya śleṣaṇāt* //
K01vinv_06u:902: idānīṃ rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ kaṇṭhād eṣā vamet kṣaṇāt* /
K01vinv_06u:906: putrasnehaṃ vinodya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv_06u:907: tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī cāturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā kacaṃgalayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:909: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā /
K01vinv_06u:911: anādyakālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:914: tat kṛtaṃ bhavatā me 'dya cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇam* //
K01vinv_06u:915: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca te aham* /
K01vinv_06u:916: sthāpitā suprayatnena sādhu te duṣkaraṃ kṛtam* //
K01vinv_06u:917: ity uktvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā /
K01vinv_06u:918: atha kacaṃgalā apareṇa samayena svāminam anujñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā /
K01vinv_06u:919: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇā /
K01vinv_06u:921: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato (fol. 147r1 = GBM 6.962) 'ntike brahmacaryam iti /
K01vinv_06u:923: tatas tayā pravrājitā upasaṃpāditā avavādo dattaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:924: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:927: yadā bhagavān bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saṃkṣepeṇoddiśya vihāraṃ praviśati pratisaṃlayanāya tadā taṃ kacaṃgalā vistareṇa vyākaroti /
K01vinv_06u:929: eṣāgrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇāṃ yaduta kacaṃgalā bhikṣuṇī iti /
K01vinv_06u:930: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:931: kiṃ bhadanta kacaṃgalāyāḥ karma kṛtaṃ yena vṛddhā pravrajitā /
K01vinv_06u:932: kiṃ ca karma kṛtaṃ yena daridrā dāsī ca saṃvṛttā bhagavāṃś ca paścimena garbhavāsena dhāritaḥ
K01vinv_06u:937: (MSV I 23) bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi
K01vinv_06u:939: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ vartamānasya eṣā mama mātā babhūva /
K01vinv_06u:940: yadāhaṃ pravrajitum icchāmi tadā mām eva vārayati /
K01vinv_06u:944: na cānayā puṇyamaheśākhyasaṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yathā mahāmāyayā yenāham anayā paścime garbhavāsena dhāritaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:945: kāśyape ca samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajitā yāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhikṣuṇyo dāsīvādena samudācaritāḥ
K01vinv_06u:947: yat tatrānayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* yasyāś copādhyāyikāyāḥ sakāśe pravrajitā sā bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
K01vinv_06u:948: tatrānayā maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe anuttare dakṣiṇīye yāvad āyur brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ na ca kaścid guṇagaṇo 'dhigataḥ
K01vinv_06u:949: / anena kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapenottaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛto bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:950: tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato
K01vinv_06u:953: yathaiṣā me upādhyāyikā bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
K01vinv_06u:954: (fol. 147v1 = GBM 6.963) evaṃ mām apy asau bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sūtravibhāgakartrīṇām agrāṃ nirdiśed iti /
K01vinv_06u:955: tat praṇidhānavaśād etarhi mayā sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
K01vinv_06u:956: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:960: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam idam
K01vinv_06u:964: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt*
K01vinv_06u:965: / atha bhagavān saṃprasthito yāvad anyatamasminn ārāme /
K01vinv_06u:968: adrākṣīt sa brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva /
K01vinv_06u:972: tato rajjuṃ tipyakaṃ ca gopāyitvā sthitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:974: pāṃcikena ca mahāyakṣasenāpatinā tad udapānaṃ plāvīkṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:977: tato 'sau brāhmaṇo mahardhiko 'yaṃ śramaṇo gautamo mahānubhāva iti viditvātiprasannaḥ kathayati
K01vinv_06u:981: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
K01vinv_06u:982: kiṃ kuryād udapānena āpaś cet sarvato yadi /
K01vinv_06u:983: chitveha mūlaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kasya paryeṣaṇāṃ caret* // iti //
K01vinv_06u:985: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ pūrvavad yāvat*
K01vinv_06u:987: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭīparītadehaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:988: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau naiva sthito buddhamanorathena // {MS:
K01vinv_06u:989: tasthur nepacchitā; cf. nepacchitā -> Pravr-v III, fol.47r6}
K01vinv_06u:990: tenodyacchamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
K01vinv_06u:992: traidhātukavītarāgaḥ pūrvavad yāvad abhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:993: atha bhagavāñ chūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran vairaṃbhyam anuprāpto vairaṃbhye viharati naḍerapicumandamūle /
K01vinv_06u:994: tena khalu samayena vairaṃbhyeṣv agnidatto nāma brāhmaṇarājo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca /
K01vinv_06u:995: aśrauṣīd agnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ śūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran vairaṃbhyam anuprāpto vairaṃbhye viharati naḍerapicumandamūle (MSV I 26) iti /
K01vinv_06u:997: śramaṇo gautamaḥ sarvasāmantarājānāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rhatsaṃmataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:998: saced ahaṃ śramanaṃ gautamaṃ na satkariṣyāmi prātisīmānāṃ koṭṭarājānāṃ garhyo bhaviṣyāmi /
K01vinv_06u:999: bālo vata bhavanto 'gnidatto brāhmaṇarājo yasya grāmakṣetram upaniśritya śramaṇo gautamo viharati na ca satkaroti /
K01vinv_06u:1000: (fol. 148r1 = GBM 6.964) yanv ahaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayeyam
K01vinv_06u:1001: viditvā mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena vairaṃbhyān niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1002: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1003: ekāntaniṣaṇṇam agnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv_06u:1004: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarāja utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1005: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān gautamas traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti /
K01vinv_06u:1007: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1008: tena niveśanaṃ gatvā amātyānām ājñā dattā /
K01vinv_06u:1009: pratidivasam aṣṭādaśaprakāraṃ khādyakaṃ pacata nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ ca prabhūtaṃ bhaktam*
K01vinv_06u:1012: yo bhojayati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti /
K01vinv_06u:1013: sa evaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā (MSV I 27) rātrau śayitaḥ svapnam
K01vinv_06u:1015: ātmīyair antraiḥ {MS ātmadīyair antraiḥ} sarvaṃ vairaṃbhyaṃ nagaraṃ veṣṭitam* /
K01vinv_06u:1016: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhītaḥ saṃtaptaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghu laghv eva mahārhaśayanād utthāya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1017: / mā haiva me atonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya vāntarāya iti
K01vinv_06u:1018: / sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa /
K01vinv_06u:1023: yady aham enam anusaṃvarṇayeyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā śramaṇo gautamaḥ prasādam utpādayiṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:1024: yanv aham enaṃ vivarṇayeyeam iti viditvā kathayati /
K01vinv_06u:1027: niyataṃ devasya rājyacyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya vāntarāyaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1029: aho vata me na rājyacyutiḥ syād vā jīvitasyāntarāya iti viditvā brāhmaṇaṃ purohitam idam avocat*
K01vinv_06u:1030: upādhyāya ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yena me na rājyacyutir bhaven nāpi jīvitasyāntarāya iti /
K01vinv_06u:1032: yadi devas traimāsīm adarśanapathe tiṣṭhati evaṃ devasya na rājyacyutir bhavati nāpi jīvitasyāntarāyaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1037: na (fol. 148v1 = GBM 6.965) mama kenacit traimāsīṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyam* /
K01vinv_06u:1038: ya upasaṃkrāmati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti /
K01vinv_06u:1039: sa ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā (MSV I 28) traimāsīm adarśanapathe sthitaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1040: / āyuṣmān ānandaḥ kālyam evotthāya yenāgnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya
K01vinv_06u:1042: yāvat paśyaty agnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya pauruṣeyā alpotsukān kṛtvā tiṣṭhanti /
K01vinv_06u:1047: na tv agnidattena brāhmaṇarājena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghas traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1048: te yūyam alpotsukās tiṣṭhatha nāhāraṃ sajjīkurutha nāsanaprajñaptim* /
K01vinv_06u:1052: paṃcānāṃ śatānām āhāraṃ sajjīkuruta praṇītaṃ prabhūtaṃ ceti /
K01vinv_06u:1058: ya upasaṃkrāmati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti /
K01vinv_06u:1064: gacchānanda saṃghāṭīm ādāya paścācchramaṇaṃ ca vairaṃbhye rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv ārocaya
K01vinv_06u:1065: yo yuṣmākaṃ bhavantaḥ utsahate buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca traimāsīṃ bhojayituṃ bhojayatv iti /
K01vinv_06u:1066: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīm ādāya paścācchramaṇaṃ ca rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv ārocayati /
K01vinv_06u:1067: yo yuṣmākaṃ bhavantaḥ utsahate buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ traimāsīṃ bhojayituṃ sa bhojayatv iti /
K01vinv_06u:1071: api tu anena kalirājena ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam* /
K01vinv_06u:1072: nānyena kenacit traimāsīm upanimaṃtrya buddhapramuko bhikṣusaṃgho bhojayitavyam* /
K01vinv_06u:1073: yo bhojayati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti /
K01vinv_06u:1074: yāvad uttarāpathāt sārthavāhaḥ paṃcāśvaśatāni paṇyam ādāya vairaṃbhyam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1076: yad idānīṃ gamiṣyāmi aśvānāṃ khuraḥ kledam āpatsyate /
K01vinv_06u:1082: śrutaṃ cānena rājñā ayaṃ cāyaṃ ca kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1088: āryānanda mayā aśvājāneyasya dvau yavaprasthau prajñaptau /
K01vinv_06u:1090: yadi bhagavān utsahate yavān paribhoktum ahaṃ bhagavataḥ prasthadvayam anuprayacchāmi /
K01vinv_06u:1095: mayaivaitāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāni
K01vinv_06u:1096: avaśyaṃbhāvīni mayaivaitāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:1097: na hi karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante /
K01vinv_06u:1101: pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām iti /
K01vinv_06u:1105: yo yuṣmākam utsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ vairaṃbhye traimāsīṃ yavān paribhoktuṃ sa śalākāṃ gṛhṇātv iti /
K01vinv_06u:1106: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya śalākāṃ cārayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1107: yāvad bhagavatā śalākāṃ gṛhītvā bhikṣudvayonaiś ca pāṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1109: bhagavann ahaṃ vāyvābādhiko notsahe traimāsīṃ yavān paribhoktum iti /
K01vinv_06u:1112: tato bhagavān bhikṣudvayaunaiḥ paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ vairaṃbhye varṣā upagataḥ
K01vinv_06u:1113: / āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau triśaṅkuṃ parvataṃ gatvā varṣā
K01vinv_06u:1115: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa divyayā sudhayā pravāritau /
K01vinv_06u:1116: tataḥ sārthavāho bhagavato dvau yavaprasthāv anuprayacchati /
K01vinv_06u:1118: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1120: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaṃśam ādāya yenānyatamā vṛddhā strī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1121: upasaṃkramya (MSV I 31) tāṃ striyam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1129: bhagini śakṣyasi tvaṃ tathāgatasyārthāya yavān parikarmīkartum iti /
K01vinv_06u:1139: yady aham asyā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kariṣye (fol. 149v1 = GBM 6.967) gambhīrā buddhadharmāḥ sthānam etad vidyate yad asau na vijñāsyatīti yanv aham asyāś cakraratnavarṇodāharaṇam udāhareyam iti viditvā kathayati /
K01vinv_06u:1140: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv_06u:1143: cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvaratnasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasya saptamasya /
K01vinv_06u:1144: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasya cakraratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv_06u:1145: iha bhagini rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tad eva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātopavāsair alaṃkṛtasya upari prāsādatalagatasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ (MSV I 32) śubham akarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ sarvasauvarṇam*
K01vinv_06u:1147: yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tad eva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ pūrvavad yāvat sarvasauvarṇam*
K01vinv_06u:1149: addhāham asmi rājā cakravartīti cakraratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāma utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tac cakraratnam ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pratigṛhya vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā anuvartayati /
K01vinv_06u:1150: jayasva bho cakraratna yenāryaḥ purāṇaś cakravartipatha iti /
K01vinv_06u:1151: atha cakraratnaṃ rājñā cakravartinā anupravartitam uparivihāyasam abhyudgamya pūrveṇa prāyāsīdyenāryaḥ purāṇaś cakravartipathaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1152: anveti rājā cakravartī tac cakraratnaṃ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
K01vinv_06u:1153: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe tac cakraratnaṃ pratitiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī vāsaṃ kalpayati sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
K01vinv_06u:1154: ye khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi koṭṭarājānas te yena rājā cakravartī tenopasaṃkrāmanti /
K01vinv_06u:1158: ime devasya janapadā ṛddhāś ca sphītāś ca kṣemāś ca subhikṣāś cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tān devaḥ samanuśāstu /
K01vinv_06u:1160: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni vijitāni samanuśāsatha
K01vinv_06u:1162: mā ca vaḥ kasyacid adharmacāriṇo vipaccāriṇo rāṣṭre vāso rocatām* /
K01vinv_06u:1164: atha tac cakraratnaṃ pūrvāṃ diśam abhinirjitya pūrvavan mahāsamudraṃ pratyuttīrya dakṣiṇena paścimenottareṇa prāyāsīd yenāryaḥ purāṇaś cakravartipathaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1165: atha cakraratnaṃ rājñā cakravartinānupravartitam upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya uttareṇānvāvṛtaṃ yenāryaḥ purāṇaś cakravartipathaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1166: anveti rājā cakravartī tac cakraratnaṃ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena (fol. 150r1 = GBM yasmin pradeśe tac cakraratnaṃ pratitiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī vāsaṃ kalpayati sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
K01vinv_06u:1167: ye khalūttarasyāṃ diśi koṭṭarājānaḥ te yena rājā cakravartī tenopasaṃkrāmanti
K01vinv_06u:1171: ime devasya janapadā ṛddhāś ca sphītāś ca kṣemāś ca subhikṣāś cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca /
K01vinv_06u:1174: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni vijitāni samanuśāsatha dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa /
K01vinv_06u:1175: mā ca vaḥ kasyacid adharmacāriṇo rāṣṭre vāso rocatām iti /
K01vinv_06u:1176: atha cakraratnam uttarāṃ diśam abhinirjityottaramahāsamudraṃ pratyuttīrya tām eva rājadhānīm āgatyoparyasyādhikaraṇasyocchrāpitam ivāsthāt* /
K01vinv_06u:1177: rājño bhagini cakravartino (MSV I 34) loke prādurbhāvād asyaivaṃrūpasya cakraratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv_06u:1178: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasya hastiratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv_06u:1179: iha bhagini rājñaś cakravartino hastī bhavati sarvaśvetaḥ kumudavarṇaḥ saptāṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhito 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1180: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājñaś cakravartinaś cittam abhiprasīdati /
K01vinv_06u:1181: bhadrakaṃ varahastiratnaṃ sakṛd damatham (fol. 150v1 = GBM 6.969) eṣyatīti
K01vinv_06u:1182: / atha rājā cakravartī saṃkhyātaṃ hastidamakaṃ dūtena prakroṣyedam avocat*
K01vinv_06u:1183: / idaṃ tvayā saumya saṃkhyātaṃ hastiratnaṃ kṣipram eva sudāntaṃ kṛtvāsmākam upanayitavyam iti /
K01vinv_06u:1184: evaṃ deva iti saṃkhyāto hastidamako rājñaś cakravartinaḥ pratiśrutya hastiratnam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir
K01vinv_06u:1185: / tadekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
K01vinv_06u:1186: tadyathānye hastino 'nekavārṣikā anekavarṣagaṇadāntāḥ sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānaṃ pratigṛhṇanti
K01vinv_06u:1187: evam etad dhastiratnam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
K01vinv_06u:1188: dāntaṃ cainaṃ viditvā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ upanāmayati /
K01vinv_06u:1191: atha rājā cakravartī tad dhastiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamaye tad dhi hastiratnam abhiruhyemām eva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anvāhiṇḍya tām eva rājadhānīm (MSV I 35) āgatya prātarāśikam akārṣīt* /
K01vinv_06u:1192: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvād asyaivaṃrūpasya hastiratnasya prādurbhāvo bhavati
K01vinv_06u:1193: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasyāśvaratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati
K01vinv_06u:1194: iha bhagini rājñaś cakravartinaḥ aśvo bhavati sarvanīlaḥ kṛṣṇaśirā manojño javano 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1195: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājñaś cakravartinaś cittam abhiprasīdati /
K01vinv_06u:1197: atha rājā cakravartī saṃkhyātam aśvadamakaṃ dūtena prakroṣyedam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1198: idaṃ tvayā saumya saṃkhyātam aśvaratnaṃ kṣipram eva sudāntaṃ kṛtvāsmākam upanayitavyam iti
K01vinv_06u:1200: 'śvadamako rājñaś cakravartinaḥ pratiśrutya tad aśvaratnam ekāhnā
K01vinv_06u:1202: tadekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
K01vinv_06u:1203: tadyathānye aśvā anekavārṣikā anekavarṣagaṇadāntāḥ sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānāḥ sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇanti /
K01vinv_06u:1204: evam eva tad aśvaratnam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhir upasaṃkramyamānam ekāhnā sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhṇāti
K01vinv_06u:1205: dāntaṃ cainaṃ viditvā rājñaś cakravartina upanāmayati /
K01vinv_06u:1206: dāntaṃ deva bhadram aśvaratnaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate /
K01vinv_06u:1207: atha rājā cakravartī aśvaratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamaye tad aśvaratnam abhiruhyemām eva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anvāhiṇḍya tām eva rājadhānīm āgatya (MSV I 36) prātarāśam akārṣīt* /
K01vinv_06u:1208: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvād asyaivaṃrūpasyāśvaratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati
K01vinv_06u:1209: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasya maṇiratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati
K01vinv_06u:1210: iha bhagini rājñaś cakravartino maṇir bhavati aṣṭāṃśo vaiḍūryaḥ śubho jātimānaccho viprasannaḥ anāvilaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1211: yāvad rājñaś cakravartino 'ntaḥpure dīpakṛtyaṃ sarvaṃ tanmaṇer ābhayā /
K01vinv_06u:1212: atha rājā cakravartī tan maṇiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo 'ndhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātryāṃ śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ deve vṛṣṭāyamāne vidyutsu niścarantīṣu maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropyodyānabhūmiṃ niryāti sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
K01vinv_06u:1213: yāvat khalu rājñaś cakravartino caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ sarvaḥ sphuṭo maṇer ābhayā /
K01vinv_06u:1215: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvād asyaivaṃrūpasya maṇiratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K01vinv_06u:1216: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasya strīratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati
K01vinv_06u:1217: iha bhagini rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strī bhavati abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikī nātigaurī nātiśyāmā madgurucchavir nātidīrghā nātihrasvā supratiṣṭhitā nātikṛśā nātisthūlā nātyutsadamāṃsā tanugātrī tasyāḥ khalu bhagini śīte uṣṇasaṃsparśāni gātrāṇi uṣṇe śītasaṃsparśāni gātrāṇi kāliṅgaprāvāramṛdusaṃsparśāni
K01vinv_06u:1218: tasyāḥ khalu bhagini sarvaromakūpebhyaś candanagandho vāti mukhāc ca utpalagandhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1219: yāvad āyuṣmān ānandaḥ strīratnaṃ vibhajati tāvat tayā dārikayā te yāvaḥ parikarmitāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1220: sā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhā (fol. 151r1 =
K01vinv_06u:1221: ārya anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnaṃ syām iti /
K01vinv_06u:1222: athāyuṣmān ānando yavān parikarmitān ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1228: kim abhūt te ānanda tayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1229: tena hy ānanda yāvāṃs te 'bhūt tayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdham
K01vinv_06u:1231: athāyuṣmān ānando yat tasyābhūt tayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras tat sarvaṃ bhagavato vistareṇārocayati /
K01vinv_06u:1232: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1233: kasmāt tvayānanda tayā dārikayā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ na kṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:1235: gambhīrā buddhadharmāḥ sthānam etad vidyate yad asau dārikā na vijñāsyatīti /
K01vinv_06u:1238: sacet tvayā tasyā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtam abhaviṣyat sthānam etad vidyate yat tu yām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avaivartikaṃ cittam utpāditam abhaviṣyat*
K01vinv_06u:1239: / api tv ānanda bhaviṣyaty asau dārikā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnam* /
K01vinv_06u:1241: yaḥ kaścid ādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ paṭaplotikaṃ prāvṛtyāntargṛhaṃ gacchati /
K01vinv_06u:1242: tasmān na bhikṣuṇā paṭaplotiṃ prāvṛtyāntargṛhaṃ gantavyam* /
K01vinv_06u:1247: sā bhagavatā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnaṃ vyākṛtā
K01vinv_06u:1248: / iti śrutvā yaiḥ paṃcabhir dārikāśatair dvyūnair bhikṣudvayonānāṃ paṃcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ yavāḥ parikarmitāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1251: yāvad bhagavān yavān paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ āyuṣmān ānando viklavaḥ aśrūṇi pramoktum ārabdhaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1252: bhagavatā teṣu janmaparivarteṣu karacaraṇaśiraśchedādīni dānāni datvā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ sarvajñatvam avāpya idānīṃ koṭarayavān bhakṣayatīti /
K01vinv_06u:1254: kasmāt tvam ānanda viklavaḥ aśrūṇi pramuṃcasi /
K01vinv_06u:1255: bhagavān bhadanta cakravartikule jāto rājyam apahāya pravrajitaḥ karacaraṇaśirādīni dānāni datvā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ sarvajñatvam avāpya idānīṃ koṭarayavān bhakṣayatīti /
K01vinv_06u:1257: ākāṃkṣasi tvam ānanda tathāgatasya daṃṣṭrāntaravinirgatān yavān
K01vinv_06u:1260: tato bhagavatā āyuṣmata ānandāya daṃṣṭrāntaravinirgatānāṃ (fol. 151v1 = GBM 6.971) yavānām eko dattaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1261: tathā hy ānanda tathāgatasya (MSV I 39) rasāgragatānāṃ rasaharaṇī supariśuddhā /
K01vinv_06u:1262: yadi tathāgataḥ prākṛtam apy āhāraṃ paribhuṃkte tad api tathāgatasyānnaśatarasaṃ saṃparivartate
K01vinv_06u:1264: agnidatto brāhmaṇarājo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgham upanimaṃtryādarśanapathe sthito bhagavān vairaṃbhye yavān paribhuṃkte iti /
K01vinv_06u:1265: sāmantarājair api śrutaṃ tair agnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:1266: te praveśaṃ na labhante dvāri sthitāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1267: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutaṃ tena paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni parṇopagūṭhasya śāleḥ preṣitāni
K01vinv_06u:1269: bahuśo mayā śramaṇo gautamo viheṭhito na kadācid avatāro labdhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1270: atrāpi tāvad asya praharāmi iti viditvā āyuṣmantam ānandam ātmānaṃ vinirmāya teṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ śakaṭaśatānāṃ purataḥ sthitvā kathayati /
K01vinv_06u:1273: ārya ānanda agnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham upanimaṃtryādarśanapathe sthito bhagavān vairaṃbhye yavān paribhuṃkte iti /
K01vinv_06u:1274: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutvaitāni parṇopagūṭhasya śāler bhagavato 'rthāya paṃca śakaṭaśatāni preṣitāni iti /
K01vinv_06u:1277: yadi bhagavān ākāśe pātraṃ prasārayati tad api devās trayastriṃśā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pūrayanti
K01vinv_06u:1281: āryānanda saṃprasthitā vayaṃ kim idānīṃ nivartāmaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1286: sa uparivihāyasam abhyudgamya akṣamātrābhir vāridhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1287: tena tāvad dṛṣṭaṃ yāvat tāni śakaṭāni nābhiṃ yāvan nimagnāni /
K01vinv_06u:1288: tatas te śākaṭikā balīvardān muktvā prakrāntā iti /
K01vinv_06u:1289: tatra bhagavatā vairaṃbhye yavāḥ paribhuktāḥ sārdhaṃ dvayonaiḥ paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1290: āyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ triśaṃkuke parvate varṣopagatābhyāṃ divyā sudhā paribhuktā
K01vinv_06u:1291: tatas tena sārthavāhena traimāsasyātyayād bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho bhaktenopanimaṃtritaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1293: sa sārthavāhas tām eva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya pūrvavad yāvad bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1294: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājā bhaveyaṃ cakravartī aśvājāneyaḥ putro yuvarājas tāny api paṃcāśvaśatāni paṃca putraśatāni /
K01vinv_06u:1296: bhagavatā strīratnaṃ yāni paṃca dārikāśatāni tasyāḥ paricārikā iti /
K01vinv_06u:1297: tato bhagavāṃs tasya sārthavāhasya cetasā cittam ājñāya taṃ sārthavāham idam
K01vinv_06u:1299: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ sārthavāha rājā cakravartī aśvājāneyas te putro yuvarājas tāny api paṃcāśvaśatāni paṃca putraśatāni /
K01vinv_06u:1302: tāny api dvyūnāni paṃca dārikāśatāni tasyāḥ paricārikā iti /
K01vinv_06u:1303: atha bhagavān traimāsasyātyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate
K01vinv_06u:1310: āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāgnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1311: tena khalu samayenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ puṇyāham āgamayaṃs tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv_06u:1313: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājas tenopasaṃkrama /
K01vinv_06u:1315: ānando bhikṣur dvāre tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti /
K01vinv_06u:1316: evam ārya iti dauvārikapuruṣaḥ āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya yenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1318: devāryānando bhikṣur dvāre tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāmaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1320: ahaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa puṇyāham āgamayaṃs tiṣṭhāmi /
K01vinv_06u:1324: nāmakalyāṇo rūpakalyāṇo varṇakalyāṇaḥ pratibhānakalyāṇaḥ pratipattikalyāṇaś ca /
K01vinv_06u:1327: dauvārikeṇāyuṣmata ānandāyaivam ārocitam* āyuṣmān ānandaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1328: te 'pi sāmantarājānāṃ dūtās tenaiva sārdhaṃ praviṣṭāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1329: athāyuṣmān ānando 'gnidattaṃ brāhamaṇarājam ārogyayitvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1330: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ āyuṣmān ānando 'gnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1331: bhagavāṃs te mahārāja ārogyayati kathayati ca /
K01vinv_06u:1332: uṣitāḥ smo mahārāja tava vijite traimāsīm* /
K01vinv_06u:1336: kaccid āryānanda bhagavān vairaṃbhyeṣu janapadeṣu sukhaṃ varṣoṣitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1339: devo 'pratyakṣitarājyas tvaṃ yo bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsīm upanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1342: satyam āryānanda bhagavatā traimāsīṃ yavāḥ paribhuktāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1345: pṛthivyāṃ nipatito mahatā jalapariṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇaḥ amātyān āhūya pṛcchati /
K01vinv_06u:1346: bhavanto na mayā yuṣmākam ājñā dattā /
K01vinv_06u:1351: na tv ājñā dattā amukasya dātavyam iti /
K01vinv_06u:1352: api tu adyāpy āhāraḥ sajjīkṛta eva /
K01vinv_06u:1354: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1355: ekāntaniṣaṇṇam agnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv_06u:1356: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1357: 43) atyayo bhagavann atyayaḥ sugata yathā bālo yathā mūḍho yathāvyakto
K01vinv_06u:1360: tasya mama bhagavann atyayaṃ jānato 'tyayaṃ paśyataḥ atyayam atyayataḥ pratigṛhṇīṣvānukampām upādāya /
K01vinv_06u:1361: tathyaṃ te mahārāja atyayam atyayata āgamā yathā bālo yathā mūḍho yathāvyakto yathākuśalo yas tvaṃ tathāgataṃ traimāsīm upanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1362: yatas tvaṃ mahārāja atyayaṃ jānāsy atyayaṃ paśyasi taṃ ca dṛṣṭvādeśayasi vṛddhir eva te pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1364: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K01vinv_06u:1366: tathāgato mahārāja alpāyuṣke kāle jātaḥ prabhūtaṃ ca kāryaṃ karaṇīyam* /
K01vinv_06u:1369: yady evam adhivāsayatu me bhagavān saptavarṣāṇi saptamāsān saptadivasān* /
K01vinv_06u:1373: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
K01vinv_06u:1375: yady aham asyaikabhaktakam api nādhivāsayāmi sthānam etad vidyate yady agnidatto brāhmaṇarāja uṣṇaṃ (MSV
K01vinv_06u:1376: I 44) śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena /
K01vinv_06u:1377: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena svaṃ
K01vinv_06u:1380: 'sau upāyaḥ syād yena sarvo 'yam āhāro buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena
K01vinv_06u:1387: bhavanto yāvān ayam āhāraḥ sarvam etat samantāt pṛthivyām ākirata iti /
K01vinv_06u:1389: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājas tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya pūrvavad yāvad bhagavān purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1390: yāvad anyatamena mahallena saṃjātāmarṣeṇāsmābhis traimāsīṃ koṭarayavāḥ paribhuktāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1391: idānīm ayaṃ kalirājo vibhavaṃ darśayatīti viditvā khādanīyabhojanīyasya pṛthivyām ākīrṇasyopari pārṣṇiprahāro dattaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1397: yaḥ kaścid ādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ (MSV I 45)
K01vinv_06u:1398: mukhābhyavahāryaṃ pādena spṛśantīti viditvā bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
K01vinv_06u:1399: amukena bhikṣavo mahallabhikṣuṇā saṃjātāmarṣeṇa khādanīyabhojanīyasya mukhābhyavahāryasya pṛthivyām ākīrṇasyopari pārṣṇiprahāro datta iti /
K01vinv_06u:1401: tasmān na bhikṣuṇā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ mukhābhyavahāryaṃ pādenākramitavyam* /
K01vinv_06u:1403: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayati pūrvavad yāvad dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv_06u:1404: atha bhagavān agnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
K01vinv_06u:1405: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1406: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavas trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1407: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthur /
K01vinv_06u:1408: ekāntasthitāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan* /
K01vinv_06u:1410: {Tib. inserts the whole Vairambhasūtra; cf. AN II 54-57}
K01vinv_06u:1412: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ (MSV I
K01vinv_06u:1414: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yena karacaraṇaśiraśchedādinā dānasaṃbhāreṇa yāvad dīnajanaṃ saṃtarpya kalpāsaṃkhyeyaṃ yat trayaṃ satvārthe ātmānaṃ parikhedyāpagatasarvakāryo vairaṃbhye koṭarayavān paribhuktavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣudvyūnaiḥ paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1418: tathāgatenaiva etāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām* /
K01vinv_06u:1419: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K01vinv_06u:1420: saḥ aśītibhikṣusahasraparivāro bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniśritya viharati /
K01vinv_06u:1421: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo gaṇavācako brāhmaṇaḥ pāñcaśatikaṃ gaṇaṃ brāhmaṇakān maṃtrān pāṭhayati /
K01vinv_06u:1422: sarvalokasya cātyarthaṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rhat saṃmataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1423: yata eva vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptas tata eva taṃ na kaścit satkaroti na gurukaroti na mānayati na pūjayati /
K01vinv_06u:1426: yāvat saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bandhumatīṃ
K01vinv_06u:1428: tato nānāsūpikarasopetasya bhaktasya pātrāṇi pūrayitvā nirgacchanti /
K01vinv_06u:1429: tena ca brāhmaṇena dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca /
K01vinv_06u:1430: bho bhikṣavaḥ paśyāmi kīdṛśaḥ piṇḍapāto labdha iti /
K01vinv_06u:1433: nārhantīme muṇḍakāḥ śramaṇakā nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ śālyodanaṃ paribhoktum* /
K01vinv_06u:1437: nārhanty eva ime muṇḍakāḥ śramaṇakā nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ śālyodanaṃ paribhoktum* /
K01vinv_06u:1439: tatra ca dvau māṇavakau śrāddhau bhadrau kalyāṇāśayau /
K01vinv_06u:1442: mahātmāna ete 'rhanty eva divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhoktuṃ na koṭarayavān iti /
K01vinv_06u:1445: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv_06u:1446: yāni tāni dvyūnāni paṃca māṇavakaśatāni etāny eva paṃca bhikṣuśatāni /
K01vinv_06u:1447: yau tau dvau māṇavakau śrāddhau bhadrau kalyāṇāśayau etāv eva tau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau
K01vinv_06u:1448: / yan mayā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇām antike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ dvyūnaiś ca paṃcabhir
K01vinv_06u:1449: māṇavakaśatair anumoditaṃ dvābhyāṃ tu nānumoditaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenaitarhi tathāgatena vairaṃbhye koṭarayavāḥ paribhuktāḥ (MSV I 48)
K01vinv_06u:1452: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ (fol. 154r1 = GBM 6.976) karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1453: pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1455: {Mark Allon 2003: Parallel see SN IV 179-181} tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam
K01vinv_06u:1458: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt* /
K01vinv_06u:1459: atha bhagavān dakṣiṇapaṃcāle janapadacārikāṃ carann ayodhyām anuprāptaḥ ayodhyāyāṃ viharati nadyā gaṃgāyās tīre /
K01vinv_06u:1462: ekāntasthitaḥ sa bhikṣur bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1463: sādhu me bhagavaṃs tathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntike saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvā eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā vihareyam* /
K01vinv_06u:1464: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā viharan yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ
K01vinv_06u:1465: keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayeyam* /
K01vinv_06u:1466: kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti
K01vinv_06u:1467: / evam ukte bhagavān yena gaṃgā nadī tena vyavalokayan vyavalokayati /
K01vinv_06u:1468: adrākṣīd bhagavān nadyā gaṃgāyāḥ srotasā mahāntaṃ dāruskandham uhyamānam*
K01vinv_06u:1469: / dṛṣṭvā ca punas taṃ bhikṣum āmantrayate /
K01vinv_06u:1470: paśyasi tvaṃ bhikṣo nadyā gaṃgāyāḥ srotasā mahāntaṃ dāruskandham uhyamānam* (MSV I 49) /
K01vinv_06u:1471: evaṃ bhadanta saced eṣa na pārime tīre saṃsrakṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:1481: evam eva sacet tvaṃ bhikṣo na pārime tīre saṃsrakṣyasi /
K01vinv_06u:1484: evaṃ hi tvaṃ bhikṣo anupūrveṇa nirvāṇanimno bhaviṣyasi nirvāṇapravaṇo nirvāṇaprāgbhāraḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1485: nāhaṃ bhadanta jāne kim apārimaṃ tīraṃ kiṃ pārimaṃ tīram* /
K01vinv_06u:1493: sādhu me bhagavāṃs tathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvā pūrvavad yāvan nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
K01vinv_06u:1494: apārimaṃ tīram iti bhikṣo ṣaṇṇām ādhyātmikānām āyatanānām etad adhivacanam* /
K01vinv_06u:1495: pārimaṃ tīram iti ṣaṇṇāṃ bāhyānām āyatanānām etad
K01vinv_06u:1499: manuṣyagrāha iti yathāpīhaikaḥ saṃsṛṣṭo (fol. 154v1 = GBM 6.977) viharati gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ (MSV I 50) sahanandī sahaśokaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1500: sa sukhiteṣu sukhito duḥkhiteṣu dukhitaḥ utpannotpanneṣu kiṃ karaṇīyeṣu samādāya paryavasānānuvartī bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:1501: amanuṣyagrāha iti yathāpīhaika iti praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ caratīty anenāhaṃ śīlena vā vratena vā tapena vā brahmacaryavāsena vā syāṃ devo devānyatamo veti /
K01vinv_06u:1502: āvartagrāha iti yathāpīhaikaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hānāyāvartate /
K01vinv_06u:1503: antaḥpūtībhāva iti yathāpīhaiko duḥśīlo bhavati pāpadharmā antaḥpūtir avasrutaḥ kaṣaṃvakajātaḥ śaṃkhasvarasamācāraḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1505: evaṃ hi sacet tvaṃ bhikṣo nāpārime tīre saṃsrakṣyasi pūrvavad yāvan nirvāṇaprāgbhāraḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1506: atha sa bhikṣur bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1507: atha sa bhikṣur bhagavatā anena dāruskandhopamenāvavādenāvavāditaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1508: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā viharan yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya
K01vinv_06u:1509: vastrāṇy ācchadya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayate kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīty ājñātavān* /
K01vinv_06u:1511: tena khalu samayena nando gopālako bhagavato nātidūre sthito 'bhūt* /
K01vinv_06u:1513: tena daṇḍenāvaṣṭabdho maṇḍūkaḥ saṃchidyamāneṣu carmasu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu cittam utpādayati yady ahaṃ kāyaṃ vā cālayeyaṃ vācaṃ vā niścārayeyaṃ syād atonidānaṃ nandasya gopālasya kathāvyākṣepam iti viditvā bhagavato 'ntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ atha nando gopālako daṇḍam ekānte upanikṣipya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1515: ekāntasthito nando gopālako bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1522: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti /
K01vinv_06u:1523: tena hi nandena svāmināṃ gāvo dattāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1526: bhadanta gāvas taruṇavatsā jñāsyanti svakasvakāni gokulāni /
K01vinv_06u:1528: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ (fol.
K01vinv_06u:1529: 155r1 = GBM 6.978) bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryaṃ
K01vinv_06u:1530: / kiṃ cāpi nanda daharā gāvas taruṇavatsā jñāsyanti svakasvakāni gokulāni
K01vinv_06u:1532: api tu karaṇīyam etad gopālakena yathāpi tat svāminā bhaktācchādanaṃ svīkurvatā /
K01vinv_06u:1533: atha nando gopālako bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt
K01vinv_06u:1535: tato bhayaṃ bhayam ity uccaiḥ śabdaṃ kurvāṇaḥ pradhāvitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1541: tān dṛṣṭvā anye 'pi gopālakā aśvapālakās tṛṇahārakāḥ kāṣṭḥahārakāḥ pathājīvā utpathājīvāś ca manuṣyāḥ pradhāvitum ārabdhāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1552: tataś cāsau karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyas taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā itaś cāmutaś ca santrastāḥ
K01vinv_06u:1563: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān śāriputras tasyām eva parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt
K01vinv_06u:1565: athāyuṣmān śāriputraś ciraprakrāntaṃ nandaṃ gopālakaṃ viditvā bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1566: kasmād bhadanta bhagavatā nando gopālakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitukāmaḥ punar apy agārāyodyojitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1567: asthānam etac chāriputrānavakāśo yan nando gopālakaḥ punar api gṛhī agāram adhyāvatsyati sannidhikāraparibhoge (MSV I 53) kāmān paribhokṣyate /
K01vinv_06u:1569: idānīṃ nando gopālakaḥ svāmināṃ gā arpayitvā āgamiṣyati /
K01vinv_06u:1570: sa yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayiṣyate kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
K01vinv_06u:1571: athāpareṇa samayena nando gopālakaḥ svāmināṃ gā arpayitvā paṃcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1574: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam (fol. 155v1 = GBM 6.979) ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti /
K01vinv_06u:1575: labdhavān nando gopālakaḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K01vinv_06u:1576: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān pūrvavad yāvat suvimuktacittaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1577: dharmatā aciropapannasya devaputrasya devakanyāyā vā trīṇi cittāny utpadyante /
K01vinv_06u:1582: tiryagbhyaś cyutaś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapanno bhagavato 'ntike cittam abhiprasādyeti
K01vinv_06u:1584: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ
K01vinv_06u:1586: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam iti /
K01vinv_06u:1587: atha maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharaḥ pūrvavad yāvat sarvaṃ gaṃgātīram udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair (MSV I 54) avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv_06u:1588: atha bhagavān maṇḍūkapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān* /
K01vinv_06u:1589: yāṃ śrutvā pūrvavad yāvad anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:1592: 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
K01vinv_06u:1593: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇagatam abhiprasannam* /
K01vinv_06u:1594: atha maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva kārṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1598: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1599: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro na catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ
K01vinv_06u:1600: api tu nandena gopālena daṇḍena vāvaṣṭabdho maṇḍūkaḥ sa cchidyamāneṣu carmasu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu mā nandasya gopālakasya dharmavikṣepo bhaviṣyatīti niścalas tūṣṇīm avasthito mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1604: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1605: kiṃ bhadanta nandena gopālena paṃcaśataparivāreṇa karma kṛtaṃ yena gopālakeṣūpapanno bhagavataś ca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ (fol. 156r1 = GBM 6.980) sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:1606: maṇḍūkapūrviṇā devaputreṇa kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena maṇḍūkeṣūpapannaḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti
K01vinv_06u:1608: tenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām* /
K01vinv_06u:1609: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi /
K01vinv_06u:1610: pūrvavad yāvat sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upanisṛtya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve /
K01vinv_06u:1616: tayor apareṇa samayena parasparam adhikaraṇam utpannam* /
K01vinv_06u:1617: tāv arthārthinau tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntau pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1618: idaṃ cedaṃ cāvayor adhikaraṇam utpannaṃ vyupaśamayeti /
K01vinv_06u:1620: yady aham anayor adyaivādhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayiṣyāmi arthārthināv etau na bhūya upasaṃkramiṣyataḥ
K01vinv_06u:1621: tena sarvasaṃghaṃ saṃnipātya tad adhikaraṇaṃ saṃghamadhye upanikṣipya na ekāntīkṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:1622: ataḥ parasminn api divase tasya karvaṭake karaṇīyam utpannam* /
K01vinv_06u:1624: tatas tābhyāṃ cirayatīti saṃghaṃ saṃnipātya tad adhikaraṇam upanikṣiptam* /
K01vinv_06u:1626: yāvad asau tripiṭo bhikṣus tasmāt karvaṭakād āgataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1635: / jñāyate āyuṣmanto gopālakair yathā tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamitam iti /
K01vinv_06u:1636: tair apy anusaṃvarṇitam eva me tad upādhyāya gopālakair yathā tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamitam iti /
K01vinv_06u:1637: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tripiṭo bhikṣur eṣa evāsau nando gopālakas
K01vinv_06u:1639: yāny asya tāni paṃca sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikānāṃ śatāni etāny eva paṃca gopālakaśatāni /
K01vinv_06u:1640: yad anena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śrāvakasaṃgho gopālakavādena samudācaritaḥ sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikaiś cānusaṃvarṇitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃca janmaśatāni paṃcaśataparivāro gopālakeṣūpapannaḥ yāvad etarhy api paṃcaśataparivāro gopālakeṣv evopapannaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1641: yad anena paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tenaitarhi paṃcaśataparivāreṇa mama śāsane pravrajya (fol. 156v1 = GBM 6.981) sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:1642: maṇḍūkapūrvy api devaputraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane bhikṣur āsīt* /
K01vinv_06u:1643: prāhāṇikaḥ sa janapadacārikāṃ caran anyatamasmin karvaṭake vihāram anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1644: sa rātryāḥ prathame yāme paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā (MSV I 57)
K01vinv_06u:1651: / sa madhyame yāme utthāya niṣaṇṇo yāvad anye bhikṣavaḥ svādhyāyaṃ
K01vinv_06u:1654: sa paścime yāme utthāya niṣaṇṇo yāvad apare svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti /
K01vinv_06u:1657: ime śramaṇāḥ kāśyapīyā maṇḍūkā iva kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ raṭitā iti /
K01vinv_06u:1658: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau prāhāṇiko bhikṣur eṣa evāsau maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputraḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1659: yad anena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śrāvakā maṇḍūkavādena samudācaritāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1660: tasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃca janmaśatāni maṇḍūkeṣūpapanno yāvad etarhy api maṇḍūkeṣv evopapannaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1661: yan mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1662: yat kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ tenedānīṃ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:1663: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
K01vinv_06u:1664: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:1665: atha bhagavān nadīṃ gaṃgām avatīrṇas tatra paṃcabhir haṃsamatsyakūrmaśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtaś ca /
K01vinv_06u:1666: teṣāṃ bhagavatā tribhiḥ padair dharmaḥ (MSV I 58) deśitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1673: nāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ syād yad vayaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt
K01vinv_06u:1674: tribhiḥ padair dharmaṃ śrutvā āhāram āharema iti /
K01vinv_06u:1678: dharmatā khalv aciropapannasya devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā trīṇi cittāny utpadyante /
K01vinv_06u:1685: pūrvavad yāvan mandārakāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṃgaṃ pūrayitvā bhagavatsāmantakena nadīṃ gaṃgām avabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair ākīrya bhagavatsāmantakenānuparivāryāvasthitāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1686: bhagavatā teṣām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā pūrvavad (fol. 157r1 = GBM
K01vinv_06u:1687: 6.982) yāvad anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
K01vinv_06u:1690: ete vayaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇam gacchāmo dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
K01vinv_06u:1694: matsyakacchapahaṃsapūrviṇo devaputrā vaṇija iva labdhalābhāḥ pūrvavad yāvat svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ
K01vinv_06u:1695: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:1696: kiṃ bhadanta ebhir haṃsakacchapamatsyaiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yena haṃsakacchapamatsyeṣūpapannāḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti /
