K01vinv_06u:6410: atha kaineya ṛṣis tām eva śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pūrvavad yāvat saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati
K01vinv_06u:6411: tena buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayamānena śailaḥ pravrajito dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6415: aham api buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā pravrajiṣyāmīti /
K01vinv_06u:6416: atha kaineya ṛṣir anekaparyāyeṇa buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K01vinv_06u:6417: tato bhagavāṃs tasmai dakṣiṇām ādiśya dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6418: atha kaineya ṛṣir yat tatrotpādanadharmakaṃ sarvaṃ visarjanadharmakaṃ kṛtvā {MS
K01vinv_06u:6419: tatrotsadanadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ visarjanadharmakaṃ kṛtvā; cf. MPS 7.2
K01vinv_06u:6420: tatrotsīdana-; BHSD s.v. utsīdana} paṃcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃs
K01vinv_06u:6423: ekāntasthitaḥ kaineya ṛṣir bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:6424: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike (MSV I 266) brahmacaryam iti /
K01vinv_06u:6425: labdhavān kaineya ṛṣiḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam*
K01vinv_06u:6426: atha bhagavāṃs tad bhikṣusahasraṃ pravrajyopasaṃpādya nadyāḥ prabhadrikāyās tīre vāsam upagataś chatrāmbuvane {MS chatrāpravane} /
K01vinv_06u:6427: tatra bhagavatā paṃcabhikṣuśatāny āyuṣmate brāhmaṇakapphiṇāya dattāni /
K01vinv_06u:6430: tatra ye āyuṣmatā brāhmaṇkapphiṇenāvacoditās taiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
K01vinv_06u:6433: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6434: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān śāriputro mahāprajñānām agryo vyākṛtaḥ āyuṣmāṃś ca mahāmaudgalyāyano mahardhikānāṃ mahānubhāvānām*
K01vinv_06u:6435: / atha ca punar ye āyuṣmatā brāhmaṇakapphiṇenāvacoditās tair ahatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:6439: bhikṣava etarhi yathā tathātīte 'dhvani ye (fol. 235r1 = GBM 6.782)
K01vinv_06u:6442: ye śāriputreṇa te paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6444: bhūtacaraṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatarasminn araṇyāyatane dvau ṛṣī prativasataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6446: yāvad apareṇa samayena tayor ekaḥ (MSV I
K01vinv_06u:6448: tatas tasya māṇavakā guruviyogaduḥkhadaurmanasyasaṃtaptā itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramantas tasya dvitīyasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ
K01vinv_06u:6449: / tena te dṛṣṭā aśruparyākulekṣaṇāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca /
K01vinv_06u:6453: yanv aham eṣām upasaṃgrahaṃ kuryām iti /
K01vinv_06u:6455: yāvad apareṇa samayena so 'pi ṛṣir glānaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6461: / tatra yasya paṃcaśatāni dattāni tena tathāvacoditāni yathā ārūpyadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāni
K01vinv_06u:6462: yasyārdhatṛtīyāni tena tathāvacoditāni yathā rūpadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
K01vinv_06u:6463: yasyāpy ardhatṛtīyāni tena tathāvacoditāni yathā paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
K01vinv_06u:6464: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau ṛṣir yena tāni
K01vinv_06u:6465: paṃcamāṇavakaśatāny ārūpyadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāny eṣa evāsau kapphiṇo bhikṣus tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv_06u:6466: yenārdhatṛtīyāni rūpadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāny eṣa evāsau maudgalyāyano bhikṣuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6467: yenāpy ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpitāny eṣa evāsau śāriputro bhikṣuḥ
K01vinv_06u:6468: api tu bhikṣavo ye kapphiṇenāvacoditās te tīkṣṇendriyāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6471: yadi śāriputreṇāvacoditā nābhaviṣyan uṣmagatā apy anayagatā abhaviṣyan* /
K01vinv_06u:6478: vivāhaḥ kiṃ nu rājā vā rāṣṭraṃ vopanimantritam* /
K01vinv_06u:6479: athavā te mahāprajña pṛṣṭa ācakṣva tan mama //
K01vinv_06u:6480: na me vivāho rājā vā rāṣṭraṃ vopanimantritam*
K01vinv_06u:6482: so 'yaṃ buddha iti śrutvā śailaḥ saṃvegam āgataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6483: ka eṣa buddhaḥ kaineya pṛṣṭa ācakṣva tan mama //
K01vinv_06u:6486: dṛṣṭaṃ hy atītaṃ buddhena tathā dṛṣṭam anāgatam* /
K01vinv_06u:6488: yac ca kiṃcid abhijñeyaṃ sarvaṃ tad vetti tatvavit* /
K01vinv_06u:6490: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca tasmād buddho nirucyate //
K01vinv_06u:6492: prahātavyaṃ prahīnaṃ ca tasmād buddho nirucyate //
K01vinv_06u:6495: nihato yena māraś ca kṛṣṇabandhuḥ savāhanaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6498: vārāṇasīṃ purīṃ gatvā taṃ namasye kṛtāñjaliḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6500: bahūn mocayate satvāṃs taṃ namasye kṛtāñjaliḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6501: kutra buddhaḥ sa bhagavān kiyad dūre vināyakaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6506: tad ghāṭakam ivottaptaṃ bimbaṃ hemamayaṃ yathā //
K01vinv_06u:6524: acintyaṃ dhyāyinām agryaṃ buddhaṃ drakṣyasy anuttaram* //
K01vinv_06u:6526: dhmāyantam agniskandhaṃ vā buddhaṃ drakṣyasi gautamam* //
K01vinv_06u:6531: satyāni saṃprakāśayati madhv iva nīḍakāt sravat* /
K01vinv_06u:6533: duḥkhaṃ naikaprakāraṃ ca yac ca duḥkhasya saṃbhavam* /
K01vinv_06u:6535: adhanānāṃ dhanaṃ dātā āturāṃś ca cikitsati /
K01vinv_06u:6549: abhidhyā nāsya kāmeṣu maitracittaḥ sa jantuṣu //
K01vinv_06u:6552: śṛṇoti vividhāñ chabdān ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6553: cittaṃ pareṣāṃ jānāti kliṣṭaṃ vā yadi vāśubham* //
K01vinv_06u:6557: śāntendriyaḥ śāntacittaḥ pūrṇo vā dhyāyate hṛdi //
K01vinv_06u:6560: īdṛśo bhagavāñ chaila vahniskandha iva tejasā /
K01vinv_06u:6562: yo 'pi varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta tāyinaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6564: etaṃ brāhmaṇa paśyanti lābhas teṣām anuttaraḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6565: dṛṣṭvā ye śaraṇaṃ yānti teṣāṃ lābhabharas tataḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6566: saṃvinno brāhmaṇaḥ śailaḥ śrutvā varṇaṃ mahāmuneḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6568: na me manuṣyabhūtasya varṇa etādṛśaḥ śrutaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6570: mānadhvajaṃ prahāya tvaṃ vaṇijo vā dhanārthikaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6573: niryāti brāhmaṇaḥ śailo yena buddhāśramaḥ śubhaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6579: śailo vācam udīrayati bhavān kaccid anāmayaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6581: buddhaḥ pratyavadac chailaṃ tat khalv aham anāmayaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6584: carāmi virajo loke śuddhaḥ śuci nirāmayaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6587: mā pariklāntakāyo 'si kaccid brāhmaṇa te sukham* //
K01vinv_06u:6593: niṣadya brāhmaṇaḥ śailo lakṣaṇān īkṣate muneḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6599: dvayaṃ tatra na paśyāmi tava gātreṣu gautama //
K01vinv_06u:6601: rasanānuttamā vāpi kaccij jihvā na hrasvikā //
K01vinv_06u:6605: udumbare vā kusumaṃ durlabho hi mahāmuniḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6606: vāri grīṣmābhitapto vā bhojanaṃ vā bubhukṣitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6609: buddhaḥ pratyavadac chailaṃ kāṃkṣāṃ brāhmaṇa nirṇuda //
K01vinv_06u:6610: ubhe ca cakṣuṣī śrotre pracchādayati jihvayā /
K01vinv_06u:6613: adrākṣīd brāhmaṇa śailo guhyaṃ koṣāvṛtaṃ muniḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6616: mantreṣv āptāni me yāni dvātriṃśal lakṣaṇāny aham* /
K01vinv_06u:6617: sarvaṃ tat tava gātreṣu paripūrṇam anūnakam* //
K01vinv_06u:6621: rājā tvam arho bhavituṃ cakravartī nararṣabhaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6623: vartayati kṣitau cakraṃ rājā bhava mahīpatiḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6624: rājāham asmi śaileti dharmarājo hy anuttaraḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6626: kalyo 'smy ahaṃ kule jātaḥ kṣatriyo 'smy abhijātitaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6627: vitrāsya sabalaṃ māraṃ prāptaḥ saṃbodhim uttamām* //
K01vinv_06u:6628: smṛtir brāhmaṇa cakraṃ me prajñā me parināyakaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6629: vīryaṃ hayaḥ śīghrajavo dhuraṃ vahati coditaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6630: samādhir me maṇiśreṣṭho hy andhakāro prabhākaraḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6631: upekṣā hastināgaś ca dhuraṃ vahati coditaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6632: strī vai ratiḥ sarāgāṇāṃ prītir brāhmaṇa me ratiḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6633: prasṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇa śreṣṭhaṃ dhanaṃ gṛhagataṃ mayā //
K01vinv_06u:6635: prabodhayāmi yaiḥ suptām andhabhūtām imāṃ prajām* //
K01vinv_06u:6636: jitā mayā diśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśatrur na vidyate /
K01vinv_06u:6637: catasro me parṣadaś ca caturaṃgaṃ balaṃ mama //
K01vinv_06u:6648: mama samyaktvaṃ loke 'sminn ālokaṃ prāṇināṃ dadat* /
K01vinv_06u:6649: chinna dṛg jñānaśastreṇa vivekaś cāyudhaṃ mama //
K01vinv_06u:6651: śīlaratho nandighoṣaḥ (fol. 237r1 = GBM 6.786) sārathir me vipaśyanaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6655: śūrayuddhaṃ mayā dattaṃ dharmabherī mayā hatā /
K01vinv_06u:6659: trayo loke mahācaurā yair iyaṃ bādhyate prajā /
K01vinv_06u:6660: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca sarve te nāśitā mayā //
K01vinv_06u:6663: ārabhya paramaṃ vīryam āsravā nihatā mayā /
K01vinv_06u:6665: daṃṣṭrābalī yathā siṃha āsādya prāṇino vane /
K01vinv_06u:6666: samaṃ teṣu praharati bālye madhye mahallake //
K01vinv_06u:6669: āturasya ca me ha tvaṃ kāṃkṣāṃ vinaya gautama /
K01vinv_06u:6671: vinaya śāmya te kāṃkṣām adhimucyasva brāhmaṇa /
K01vinv_06u:6676: pravartayasi kevalaṃ cakraṃ yathā gautama bhāṣase //
K01vinv_06u:6677: senāpatiḥ ko bhavataḥ śrāvakaḥ śāstur ātmajaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6678: yat tvayā vartitaṃ cakram anuvartayati paṇḍitaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6679: asti me śrāvako brahman sadṛśaḥ prajñayātmajaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6682: yan mayā vartitaṃ cakram anuvartayati paṇḍitaḥ //
K01vinv_06u:6684: lokeṣv āścaryam utpannam aho ratnatrayaṃ param* //
K01vinv_06u:6685: ahaṃ vadāmi bhadraṃ te śrāvakatvam upāgataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6689: idaṃ bhavantaḥ śṛṇuta cakṣuṣmān bhāṣate yathā /
K01vinv_06u:6691: ya icchanty anugacchantu ye necchanti vrajantu te /
K01vinv_06u:6695: rocate ced iyaṃ tava pravraja jinaśāsane /
K01vinv_06u:6702: ehi bhikṣave ity āha sa teṣām upasaṃpadā //
K01vinv_06u:6708: tebhyas taṃ dharmam ājñāya kathāṃ tatrānulomikīm* /
K01vinv_06u:6712: saddharmaṃ ca dhanaśreṣṭhaṃ śikṣāṃ ca jinavarṇitām* /
K01vinv_06u:6715: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca satkṛtiṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajet* //
K01vinv_06u:6716: etad dhi śaraṇaṃ loke varṇitaṃ tat tvadarśinā /
K01vinv_06u:6721: atha bhagavān kāśīṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran kāśīpaṭṭam anuprāptaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6722: tasmiṃś ca kāśīpaṭṭe śobhitapūrviṇau dvau pitāputrau pravrajitau /
K01vinv_06u:6724: bhagavān śrāvakasaṃghaḥ kāśīṣu janapade cārikāṃ carann ihānuprāptaḥ śrāntakāyo bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaś ca /
K01vinv_06u:6725: yan nu vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ yavāgūpānenopanimantrayāmaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6726: tat kiṃ tvaṃ peyāṃ samudānayasi āhosvid bhikṣusaṃgham upanimaṃtrayasīti /
K01vinv_06u:6734: ārya etad apy asti te kauśalyam* /
K01vinv_06u:6755: / tato 'sau gṛhapatiḥ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pūrvavad yāvat
K01vinv_06u:6756: purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇas tatra praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ cāryate
K01vinv_06u:6767: yaḥ kaścid ādīnavo bhikṣavo jātīyaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ dhārayanti /
K01vinv_06u:6770: upasthāpayati sātisāro bhavati sthāpayitvā vaidyapūrviṇāṃ śastrakoṣaṃ kāyasthapūrviṇām api bhājanaṃ sūcikapravrajitānāṃ sūcīgṛham iti /
K01vinv_06u:6771: (fol. 238r1 = GBM 6.788; MSV I 282) bhagavān malleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran pāpām anuprāptaḥ
K01vinv_06u:6777: aśrauṣuḥ pāpeyā mallā bhagavān malleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran pāpām anuprāptaḥ pāpāyāṃ viharati jalūkāvanaṣaṇḍa iti /
K01vinv_06u:6779: bhavantaḥ śrūyate bhagavān malleṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran pāpām anuprāptaḥ pāpāyāṃ viharati jalūkāvanaṣaṇḍa iti /
K01vinv_06u:6780: saced asmākam ekaiko buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyati apare
K01vinv_06u:6783: na kenacid asmākam ekākinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojayitavyaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6785: yo yuṣmākam ekākī bhojayati sa gaṇena ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān daṇḍya iti /
K01vinv_06u:6786: atha pāpeyā mallāḥ sarve saṃbhūya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6787: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6788: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān pāpeyān mallān bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv_06u:6789: atha pāpeyā mallā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:6793: atha pāpeyā mallā bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6800: pūrvavad yāvat ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān daṇḍya iti /
K01vinv_06u:6803: athāyusmān ānando rocaṃ mallamahāmātram ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6805: ayaṃ bhadanta roco mallamahāmātro na buddhe 'bhiprasanno na dharme na saṃghe
K01vinv_06u:6807: sādhv asya bhagavāṃs tathā dharmaṃ deśayed yathaiṣa buddhe 'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe abhiprasīded iti /
K01vinv_06u:6809: atha bhagavatā rocasya mahāmātrasya tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā roco mallamahāmātro
K01vinv_06u:6811: atha roco mallamahāmātraḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjalīṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv_06u:6815: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā pāpeyā mallā (fol. 238v1 = GBM 6.789) anujñāsyanti /
K01vinv_06u:6816: sacet te roca pāpeyā mallā anujñāsyanti evaṃ te 'ham adhivāsayāmi /
K01vinv_06u:6817: atha roco mallamahāmātro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena pāpeyā mallās tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6819: / āgamayantu tāvad bhavanto yāvad ahaṃ tatprathamataraṃ bhagavantaṃ bhojaye bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
K01vinv_06u:6820: paścād yuṣmākam api (MSV I 284) na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati bhagavantaṃ bhojayituṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
K01vinv_06u:6822: asmābhis tatprathamataraṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrito na vayam anujānīma iti
K01vinv_06u:6824: yadi nānujānītha ekaṃ khādyakaṃ cārayāmi pānakaṃ ceti /
K01vinv_06u:6827: anujānīmaḥ sacet saṃghagatā tena dakṣiṇā pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavati /
K01vinv_06u:6830: bhavantas tādṛśaṃ khādyakaṃ sajjīkuruta yenaikenaiva paryāptir bhavati ahaṃ sarvopakaraṇāni dadāmīti /
K01vinv_06u:6834: atha pāpeyā mallās tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya pūrvavad yāvat purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6835: tato roco mallamahāmātraḥ khādyakaṃ cārayitum ārabdhaḥ pānakaṃ ca /
K01vinv_06u:6846: pāpeyānāṃ mallānām asāv āhāraḥ paribhogaṃ na gataḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6849: ehi buddha ehi dharma ehi saṃgha idaṃ gṛhāṇeti /
K01vinv_06u:6852: praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo 'sau bhagavān dvipadānām agrya iti /
K01vinv_06u:6853: yadi kathayanti yo 'sau bhagavān dvipadānām agrya iti /
K01vinv_06u:6858: evaṃ dharme vaktavyaṃ yo 'sau virāgāṇām agrya iti /
K01vinv_06u:6859: saṃghe vaktavyaṃ yo 'sau gaṇānām agrya iti /
K01vinv_06u:6863: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān svātir navāgatas taruṇo
K01vinv_06u:6866: uktaṃ bhagavatā yaiś cālpaṃ dattaṃ yaiś ca prabhūtaṃ dattaṃ yaiś ca praṇītaṃ dattaṃ yaiś cāttamanaskaiḥ parikarma kṛtaṃ yaiś ca prasannacittair abhyanumoditaṃ (fol. 239r1 = GBM 6.790) sarve te puṇyasya bhāgino bhavanti /
K01vinv_06u:6868: sa kāṣṭhaṃ pāṭayitum ārabdho yāvad anyatamasmāt pūtidārusuṣirān niṣkramyāśīviṣeṇa dakṣiṇe pādāṅguṣṭhe dṛṣṭaḥ
K01vinv_06u:6869: / sa viṣeṇa saṃmūrchito bhūmau patito lālā vāhayati mukhaṃ ca vibhaṇḍayati akṣiṇī ca saṃparivartayati
K01vinv_06u:6879: jñātibhir asya cikitsā kāritā abhaviṣyad iti /
K01vinv_06u:6880: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata (MSV I 286) ārocayanti /
K01vinv_06u:6889: bhikṣavo na jānate kīdṛśaṃ vikṛtabhojanam iti /
K01vinv_06u:6892: āryā yuṣmākam eva śāstā sarvajño bhagavān sarvadarśī sa eva jñāsyatīti /
K01vinv_06u:6895: vikṛtabhojanaṃ bhikṣava uccāraḥ prasrāvaś chāyikā mṛttikā ca /
K01vinv_06u:6896: tatra uccāraḥ acirajātakānāṃ vatsakānāṃ teṣām eva ca prasrāvaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6899: mṛttikā pṛthivyāṃ caturaṃgulam apanīyoddhartavyā iti vikṛtabhojanam iti /
K01vinv_06u:6900: tato bhikṣubhir āyuṣmataḥ svāter vikṛtabhojanaṃ dattam* /
K01vinv_06u:6904: śakṣyasi tvam ānanda mamāntikān mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyām udgṛhya paryavāpya svāter bhikṣo rakṣāṃ kartuṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca /
K01vinv_06u:6906: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ bhāṣate sma /
K01vinv_06u:6907: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
K01vinv_06u:6908: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṃgale hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre śrībhadre sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani sarvānarthapraśamani |
K01vinv_06u:6913: | acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi araje viraje |
K01vinv_06u:6915: amare amaraṇi brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe mukte jīvati rakṣā svātiṃ sarvopadravabhayarogebhyaḥ svāhā /
K01vinv_06u:6916: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato 'ntikān mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyām udgṛhya paryavāpya svāter bhikṣoḥ svastyayanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:6918: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6919: āscaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac ca bhagavatā mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā bahukarā ca /
K01vinv_06u:6920: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā mamātīte 'py adhvany akṣaṇapratipannasya (fol. 239v1 = GBM 6.791) vinipatitaśarīrasyāpi mahāmāyūrī vidyārājā upakarā bahukarā ca /
K01vinv_06u:6922: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo himavati parvatarāje dakṣiṇe pārśve suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājaḥ prativasati sma /
K01vinv_06u:6925: so 'yaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā rātrau svastyayanena viharati /
K01vinv_06u:6926: so 'pareṇa samayena saṃbahulābhir vanamayūrībhiḥ sārdham ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānaṃ parvatapārśveṇa parvatapārśvam atyarthaṃ kāmarāgaraktaḥ kāme 'nugṛddho grathito mūrchito madamattaḥ pramūḍhaḥ pramūrchitaḥ (MSV I 288) pravicaran prasādād anyataraṃ parvatavivaram anupraviṣṭaḥ sa tatra dīrgharātraṃ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrair hiṃsakair avatāraprekṣibhir mayūrapāśair baddhaḥ /
K01vinv_06u:6927: so 'py atra madhyagataḥ pramūḍhaḥ smṛtiṃ ca labdhvā imām eva mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ manasyakārṣīt*
K01vinv_06u:6928: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṅgalye hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre śrībhadre sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani sarvānarthapraśamani sarvamaṅgalyasādhani manasi mānasi mahāmānasi acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi araje viraje amare amṛte amaraṇi brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe vimukte jīvati rakṣa māṃ sarvopadravebhyaḥ svāhā /
K01vinv_06u:6931: suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājas tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv_06u:6932: tadāpi mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ca etarhy api mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ceti /
K01vinv_06u:6933: paśya bhadanta yāvac ca bhagavataḥ svāter bhikṣor vidyayā svastyayanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv_06u:6941: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau nāgamaṇḍalikaḥ ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv_06u:6942: yo 'sau dārakaḥ svātir bhikṣus tena kālena tena samayena /
